item.title: CNN en Españolの元編集長が運営する、スペイン・パンプローナの文化ニュースを扱うWhatsAppのみの日刊ニュースレター「Pamplonews」の様子（Hanaa' Tameez/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Hanaa' Tameez / Nieman Lab:
A look at Pamplonews, a WhatsApp-only daily newsletter covering cultural news in Pamplona, Spain, run by a former managing editor of CNN en Español  —  “There's no point in making a wonderful website or an amazing app if people aren't going to the website or downloading the app.”

item.title: ESPN、ABC、ディズニー・チャンネル、その他のディズニー・アウトレットが、新たなキャリッジ契約に合意できず、1,500万人以上の加入者を抱えるCharter's Spectrumで放送されなくなる（J. Kim Murphy/Variety）
item.description:
J. Kim Murphy / Variety:
ESPN, ABC, Disney Channel, and other Disney outlets go dark on Charter's Spectrum, which serves ~15M subscribers, after failing to agree on a new carriage pact  —  ESPN, ABC, Disney Channel and other outlets owned by the Walt Disney Co. have gone dark on Charter Spectrum cable systems …

item.title: カリフォルニア州財務長官フィオナ・マが、AMPTPに加盟する7社に書簡を送り、2つのハリウッド・ストライキを終わらせるために「公正な取引」を交渉するよう促す（Wendy Lee/Los Angeles Times）
item.description:
Wendy Lee / Los Angeles Times:
California Treasurer Fiona Ma sends letters to seven companies that are members of AMPTP, urging them to negotiate “fair deals” to end the two Hollywood strikes  —  California State Treasurer Fiona Ma sent letters this week to studios represented by the Alliance of Motion Picture …

item.title: WBDのMaxが、Netflix、Prime Video、Apple TV+に合わせて、映画とテレビ番組のトップ10リストを展開。
item.description:
Josef Adalian / Vulture:
WBD's Max rolls out Top 10 movies and TV show lists in line with Netflix, Prime Video, and Apple TV+; WBD bases rankings on unique views of at least two minutes  —  Max is finally getting into the top-ten game: Starting today, the Warner Bros. Discovery-owned streamer will begin publishing daily lists …

item.title: ロシアの裁判所がジャーナリストのルスラン・レヴィエフとミヒャエル・ナッケを「戦争フェイク」を押し付けた罪で有罪とし、11年の実刑判決を下した。
item.description:
The Moscow Times:
A Russian court finds journalists Ruslan Leviev and Michael Nacke guilty of pushing “war fakes” and hands out 11-year sentences; both now live outside of Russia  —  A Russian court has handed 11-year prison sentences to exiled anti-war journalists Ruslan Leviev and Michael Nacke …

item.title: タイムズ・シャムロック・コミュニケーションズはペンシルバニア州の4紙をオールデン・グローバル・キャピタルのメディアニュース・グループに売却する。
item.description:
WNEP-TV:
Times-Shamrock Communications is selling its four Pennsylvania dailies to Alden Global Capital's MediaNews Group; the newspapers' founding family pans the sale  —  The sale includes four local daily papers and several weekly and periodic publications.  —  SCRANTON, Pa. …

item.title: Variety』SVPのティム・グレイが42年ぶりに同誌を去り、ゴールデングローブ賞のEVPに就任。
item.description:
Michael Schneider / Variety:
Variety SVP Tim Gray departs the outlet after 42 years to become the EVP of the Golden Globes, where he is set to oversee its newly formed board of directors  —  Variety legend Tim Gray, who first joined Hollywood's dominant trade publication in 1981, has departed after 42 years to start …

item.title: IACのバリー・ディラー会長は、伝統的なハリウッド・スタジオは労働組合と直接交渉すべきであり、アップル、アマゾン、ネットフリックスという相互の「敵」と別れるべきだと語った（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
IAC Chairman Barry Diller says traditional Hollywood studios should negotiate directly with unions, splitting from Apple, Amazon, and Netflix, a mutual “enemy”  —  The mogul argues that the traditional studios should go to the guilds and cut their own deals: “We are your natural allies, not your enemies.”

item.title: YouTube Music、AndroidとiOSの「Now Playing」画面のデザインを変更、より大きなカバーアートとコメント欄を追加。
item.description:
Abner Li / 9to5Google:
YouTube Music redesigns its Now Playing screen on Android and iOS with larger cover art and a comments section, after launching real-time lyrics last week  —  After pulling a variant at the start of this year, YouTube Music is rolling out the latest redesign of Now Playing on Android and iOS, adding a comments section.

item.title: テイラー・スウィフト、10月13日に全米AMC劇場でコンサート映画を公開予定。
item.description:
Chris Willman / Variety:
Taylor Swift plans to release her concert film in AMC theaters on October 13 in the US; in a first, AMC plans to act as a distributor to unaffiliated theaters  —  Anyone who couldn't procure tickets for Taylor Swift's record-breaking stadium tour in the U.S. may be about to have their wounded …

item.title: Substack、ポッドキャスト・エピソードのトランスクリプトやソーシャルメディアで共有するための動画「オーディオグラム」を作成できるAI搭載の新ツールを発表（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
Substack launches new AI-powered tools that let creators generate transcripts of their podcast episodes and video “audiograms” for sharing on social media  —  Substack is introducing new AI-powered tools that are designed to make podcasting on the platform easier, the company announced on Wednesday.

item.title: MetaがオーストラリアとニュージーランドのThreadsでキーワード検索のテストを開始。
item.description:
Ivan Mehta / TechCrunch:
Meta begins testing keyword search on Threads in Australia and New Zealand, and plans a rollout to other English-speaking countries before adding more languages  —  Threads launched one of the most anticipated features, a web version of the platform, last week.

item.title: ムケシュ・アンバニのViacom18がJioCinemaとSports18で、インド国内の2023年9月から2028年3月までのクリケット試合のデジタル放映権とテレビ放映権を7億2100万ドルで獲得（Naman Ramachandran/Variety）
item.description:
Naman Ramachandran / Variety:
Mukesh Ambani's Viacom18 wins the digital and TV rights for India's domestic September 2023 to March 2028 cricket matches for ~$721M, on JioCinema and Sports18  —  Billionaire Mukesh Ambani's Viacom18 media conglomerate has won both digital and TV rights for India's domestic cricket matches for five years from Sept. 2023 to March 2028.

item.title: ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙をデジタル時代に向けて改革し、ニュースルームの使命を守り続けたマーク・トンプソンは、同じく苦境に立たされている巨大メディアであるCNNにふさわしい。

Margaret Sullivan / The Guardian:
Mark Thompson, who helped reinvent The New York Times for the digital age and kept the newsroom's mission, is a good bet for CNN, another beleaguered behemoth  —  As New York Times public editor, I worried about his time running the BBC  —  n late 2012, I was the newly minted public editor …

item.title: 出版社協会が英国政府に対し、英国のAIセーフティ・サミットを前に、「AIシステムによってあらゆるコンテンツが取り込まれる際、知的財産法が尊重される」ことを保証するよう要請（Daniel Thomas/Financial Times紙）
item.description:
Daniel Thomas / Financial Times:
The Publishers Association asks the UK government to ensure IP law is “respected when any content is ingested by AI systems”, ahead of the UK's AI Safety Summit  —  Trade body calls on prime minister to ensure developing technology is trained ‘transparently’
